md:
giải nghĩa từ "custom" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

**Custom** (noun)

* Meaning: a usual or traditional way of doing something
* Example: "The company has a custom of giving bonuses to employees at the end of the year."
* Related words: tradition, habit, practice

**Custom** (adjective)

* Meaning: made or done to order; specially made
* Example: "I had a custom-made suit for my wedding."
* Related words: tailored, bespoke, personalized

**Custom** (verb)

* Meaning: to make or do something to order; to adapt or modify something to fit a particular need or taste
* Example: "The company will custom the software to fit our business needs."
* Related words: tailor, modify, adapt
html:
giải nghĩa từ "custom" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

Custom (noun)

  • Meaning: a usual or traditional way of doing something
  • Example: "The company has a custom of giving bonuses to employees at the end of the year."
  • Related words: tradition, habit, practice

Custom (adjective)

  • Meaning: made or done to order; specially made
  • Example: "I had a custom-made suit for my wedding."
  • Related words: tailored, bespoke, personalized

Custom (verb)

  • Meaning: to make or do something to order; to adapt or modify something to fit a particular need or taste
  • Example: "The company will custom the software to fit our business needs."
  • Related words: tailor, modify, adapt
